titleStmt.title: A friendly letter to all young men who are desirous to live Godly lives, and are true members of the Church of England. Imprimatur Octob. the 5th. 1688. R.M.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Dan. Brown, at the Black Swan and Bible without Temple-Bar,
